description: ResourceQuotaSpec defines the desired hard limits to enforce for Quota.

scopes.description: A collection of filters that must match each object tracked by a quota. If not specified, the quota matches all objects.

hard.description: Hard is the set of desired hard limits for each named resource. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/design/admission_control_resource_quota.md#admissioncontrol-plugin-resourcequota
